languages.text: Подключаемая к организму когни-стимуляционная система. Скорее всего этот священный механизм принадлежал техножрецу или аристократу, сгинувшему при исполнении в трюмах корабля вместе с драгоценной машиной.
languages.original_text: A cogni-stimulation system designed to be connected to the user's body. This sacred mechanism likely belonged to a Tech-Priest or noble who perished during a mission to the ship's holds along with the precious machine.

traits.locale_text: Подключаемая к организму когни-стимуляционная система. Скорее всего этот священный механизм принадлежал техножрецу или аристократу, сгинувшему при исполнении в трюмах корабля вместе с драгоценной машиной.

languages.text: A cogni-stimulation system designed to be connected to the user's body. This sacred mechanism likely belonged to a Tech-Priest or noble who perished during a mission to the ship's holds along with the precious machine.
languages.original_text: Подключаемая к организму когни-стимуляционная система. Скорее всего этот священный механизм принадлежал техножрецу или аристократу, сгинувшему при исполнении в трюмах корабля вместе с драгоценной машиной.

A cogni-stimulation system designed to be connected to the user's body. This sacred mechanism likely belonged to a Tech-Priest or noble who perished during a mission to the ship's holds along with the precious machine.

languages.text: Un sistema de estimulación cognitiva que se conecta al cuerpo del usuario. Este mecanismo sagrado debió de pertenecer a un tecnosacerdote o a un noble fallecido en una misión a las bodegas de la nave junto a su valiosa máquina.
languages.original_text: A cogni-stimulation system designed to be connected to the user's body. This sacred mechanism likely belonged to a Tech-Priest or noble who perished during a mission to the ship's holds along with the precious machine.

traits.locale_text: Un sistema de estimulación cognitiva que se conecta al cuerpo del usuario. Este mecanismo sagrado debió de pertenecer a un tecnosacerdote o a un noble fallecido en una misión a las bodegas de la nave junto a su valiosa máquina.

languages.text: ユーザーの身体に接続するように設計された認知刺激システム。この神聖な機械は、おそらく技術司祭か貴族のもので、船倉へのミッション中に貴重な機械とともに亡くなった。
languages.original_text: A cogni-stimulation system designed to be connected to the user's body. This sacred mechanism likely belonged to a Tech-Priest or noble who perished during a mission to the ship's holds along with the precious machine.

traits.locale_text: ユーザーの身体に接続するように設計された認知刺激システム。この神聖な機械は、おそらく技術司祭か貴族のもので、船倉へのミッション中に貴重な機械とともに亡くなった。

languages.text: 这种认知刺激系统会直接连接到使用者的身体。这台神圣的机器可能属于某位技术神甫或某位贵族，在前往船舱的过程中不幸丧命，而这台宝贵的机器也被遗留在了原地。
languages.original_text: A cogni-stimulation system designed to be connected to the user's body. This sacred mechanism likely belonged to a Tech-Priest or noble who perished during a mission to the ship's holds along with the precious machine.

traits.locale_text: 这种认知刺激系统会直接连接到使用者的身体。这台神圣的机器可能属于某位技术神甫或某位贵族，在前往船舱的过程中不幸丧命，而这台宝贵的机器也被遗留在了原地。

languages.text: Ein Kogni-Stimulationssystem, das mit dem Körper des Nutzers verbunden wird. Dieser heilige Mechanismus gehörte wahrscheinlich einem Techpriester oder Adligen, der zusammen mit der wertvollen Maschine bei einer Mission in die Frachträume des Schiffs verschwand.
languages.original_text: A cogni-stimulation system designed to be connected to the user's body. This sacred mechanism likely belonged to a Tech-Priest or noble who perished during a mission to the ship's holds along with the precious machine.

traits.locale_text: Ein Kogni-Stimulationssystem, das mit dem Körper des Nutzers verbunden wird. Dieser heilige Mechanismus gehörte wahrscheinlich einem Techpriester oder Adligen, der zusammen mit der wertvollen Maschine bei einer Mission in die Frachträume des Schiffs verschwand.

languages.text: Un système de stimulation cognitive conçu pour être connecté au corps de l'utilisateur. Ce précieux mécanisme sacré appartenait probablement à un technoprêtre ou à un noble ayant trouvé la mort au cours d'une mission dans les cales du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: A cogni-stimulation system designed to be connected to the user's body. This sacred mechanism likely belonged to a Tech-Priest or noble who perished during a mission to the ship's holds along with the precious machine.

traits.locale_text: Un système de stimulation cognitive conçu pour être connecté au corps de l'utilisateur. Ce précieux mécanisme sacré appartenait probablement à un technoprêtre ou à un noble ayant trouvé la mort au cours d'une mission dans les cales du vaisseau.

languages.text: Kullanıcının bedeniyle bağlı kalacak şekilde tasarlanmış bir kavrauyarı sistemi. Bu kutsal mekanizma, muhtemelen gemi ambarındaki bir vazife esnasında kıymetli makineyle birlikte can veren bir Tekno Rahip'e ya da bir soyluya aitti.
languages.original_text: A cogni-stimulation system designed to be connected to the user's body. This sacred mechanism likely belonged to a Tech-Priest or noble who perished during a mission to the ship's holds along with the precious machine.
